text.*:
Ana J. Bridges
Born Ana Julia Bridges
Academic background
Alma mater University of Rhode Island
Thesis Romantic couples and partner use of sexually explicit material: the mediating role of cognitions for dyadic and sexual satisfaction (2007)
Academic work
Institutions Department of Psychological Science, J. William Fulbright College of Arts and Sciences, University of Arkansas
Website University of Arkansas

Ana Julia Bridges[1] is an assistant professor at the department of psychological science, University of Arkansas,[2] and one of the chief editors of the journal Sexualization, Media, and Society.[3]

Contents

  • 1 Education
  • 2 Bibliography
    • 2.1 Books
    • 2.2 Chapters in books
    • 2.3 Journal articles
    • 2.4 Media
  • 3 References
  • 4 External links

Education[edit]

Bridges received her PhD in clinical psychology from the University of Rhode Island in 2007.[4]

Bibliography[edit]

Books[edit]

  • Bridges, Ana J. (2007). Romantic couples and partner use of sexually explicit material: the mediating role of cognitions for dyadic and sexual satisfaction (Ph.D. thesis). University of Rhode Island. OCLC 247499203. 

Chapters in books[edit]

  • Bridges, Ana J. (2010), "Pornography's effects on interpersonal relationships", in Stoner, Jr., James R.; Hughes, Donna M., The social costs of pornography: a collection of papers, Princeton, New Jersey: Witherspoon Institute, pp. 89–110, ISBN 9780981491134.  Pdf.
  • Bridges, Ana J. (2010), "Methodological considerations in mapping pornography content", in Boyle, Karen, Everyday pornography, London New York: Routledge, pp. 34–49, ISBN 9780415543781. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Senn, Charlene Y.; Andrews III, Arthur R. (2013), "Erotica, pornography, and women's sexuality", in Castañeda, Donna, The essential handbook of women's sexuality: volume one: meanings, development, and worldwide views, Santa Barbara, California: Praeger, pp. 253–272, ISBN 9780313397097. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Anton, Corinne (2013), "Pornography and violence against women", in Sigal, Janet A.; Denmark, Florence L., Violence against girls and women: international perspectives, Santa Barbara, California: Praeger, An Imprint of ABC-CLIO, LLC, pp. 183–206, ISBN 9781440803352. 

Journal articles[edit]

2000 - 2004

  • Bridges, Ana J.; Bergner, Raymond M. (May–June 2002). "The significance of heavy pornography involvement for romantic partners: research and clinical implications". Journal of Sex & Marital Therapy. Taylor and Francis. 28 (3): 193–206. doi:10.1080/009262302760328235. PMID 11995598. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Bergner, Raymond M.; Hesson-McInnis, Matthew (January 2003). "Romantic partners' use of pornography: its significance for women". Journal of Sex & Marital Therapy. Taylor and Francis. 29 (1): 1–14. PMID 12519658.  View online.

2005 - 2009

  • Bridges, Ana J.; Holler, Karen A. (October 2007). "How many is enough? Determining optimal sample sizes for normative studies in pediatric neuropsychology". Child Neuropsychology: A Journal on Normal and Abnormal Development in Childhood and Adolescence. Taylor and Francis. 13 (6): 528–538. doi:10.1080/09297040701233875. PMID 17852130. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Sun, Chyng; Wosnitzer, Robert; Scharrer, Erica; Liberman, Rachael (September 2008). "A comparison of male and female directors in popular pornography: what happens when women are at the helm?". Psychology of Women Quarterly. Sage. 32 (3): 312–325. doi:10.1111/j.1471-6402.2008.00439.x. 

2010 - 2014

  • Bridges, Ana J.; Wosnitzer, Robert; Scharrer, Erica; Sun, Chyng; Liberman, Rachael (October 2010). "Aggression and sexual behavior in best-selling pornography videos: a content analysis update". Violence Against Women. Sage. 16 (10): 1065–1085. doi:10.1177/1077801210382866. PMID 20980228.  Pdf.
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Adams Jr., Thomas G.; Willems, Jeffrey L. (March 2011). "Contamination aversion and repeated exposure to disgusting stimuli". Anxiety, Stress & Coping. Taylor and Francis. 24 (2): 157–165. doi:10.1080/10615806.2010.506953. PMID 20737324. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Deen, Tisha L. (November 2011). "Depression literacy: rates and relation to perceived need and mental health service utilization in a rural American sample". Rural Remote Health. Deakin University. 11 (4): 1803. PMID 22126600. article no. 1803. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Morokoff, Patricia J. (December 2011). "Sexual media use and relational satisfaction in heterosexual couples". Personal Relationships. Wiley. 18 (4): 562–585. doi:10.1111/j.1475-6811.2010.01328.x. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Deen, Tisha L.; McGahan, Tara C.; Andrews III, Arthur R. (Spring 2012). "Cognitive appraisals of specialty mental health services and their relation to mental health service utilization in the rural population". The Journal of Rural Health. Wiley. 28 (2): 142–151. doi:10.1111/j.1748-0361.2011.00375.x. PMC 4060821 . PMID 22458315. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Andrews III, Arthur R.; Deen, Tisha L. (October 2012). "Mental health needs and service utilization by Hispanic immigrants residing in mid-southern United States". Journal of Transcultural Nursing. Sage. 23 (4): 359–368. doi:10.1177/1043659612451259. PMC 4060822 . PMID 22802297. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Pyle, Tara M. (December 2012). "Perceptions of relationship satisfaction and addictive behavior: comparing pornography and marijuana use". Journal of Behavioral Addictions. Akadémiai Kiadó. 1 (4): 171–179. doi:10.1556/JBA.1.2012.007. PMID 26165604.  Pdf.
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Andrews III, Arthur R.; Gomez, Debbie (April 2013). "A multi-study analysis of conceptual and measurement issues related to health research on acculturation in Latinos". Journal of Transcultural Nursing. Sage. 24 (2): 134–143. doi:10.1177/1043659612472199. PMC 4060824 . PMID 23361579. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Ham, Lindsay S.; Zamboanga, Byron L.; Casner, Hilary G.; Bacon, Amy K. (June 2013). "Alcohol expectancies and alcohol use frequency: does drinking context matter?". Cognitive Therapy and Research. Springer. 37 (3): 620–632. doi:10.1007/s10608-012-9493-0. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Cooper, Theodore (June 2013). "Conducting research with Latino participants: blending community and science". The Behavior Therapist. American Psychological Association via PsycNET. 36 (5): 108–112. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Andrews III, Arthur R.; Villalobos, Bianca T.; Pastrana, Freddie A.; Cavell, Timothy A.; Gomez, Debbie (February 2014). "Does integrated behavioral health care reduce mental health disparities for Latinos? Initial findings". Journal of Latina/o Psychology. American Psychological Association via PsycNET. 2 (1): 37–53. doi:10.1037/lat0000009. PMC 4193502 . PMID 25309845. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Karlsson, Marie E.; Bell, Jessica; Petretic, Patricia (June 2014). "Sexual violence therapy group in a women's correctional facility: a preliminary evaluation". Journal of Traumatic Stress. Wiley. 27 (3): 361–364. doi:10.1002/jts.21911. PMID 24797176. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Gomez, Debbie; Andrews III, Arthur R.; Cavell, Timothy A.; Pastrana, Freddie A.; Gregus, Samantha J.; Ojeda, Carlos A. (August 2014). "Delivering parent management training in an integrated primary care setting: description and preliminary outcome data". Cognitive and Behavioral Practice. Elsevier. 21 (3): 296–309. doi:10.1016/j.cbpra.2014.04.003. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Johnson, Jennifer A.; Sun, Chyng; Ezzell, Matt B. (December 2014). "Pornography and the male sexual script: an analysis of consumption and sexual relations". Archives of Sexual Behavior. Elsevier. 45 (4): 1–12. doi:10.1007/s10508-014-0391-2. PMID 25466233. 

2015 onwards

  • Bridges, Ana J.; Karlsson, Marie; Lindly, Elizabeth (January 2015). "The effect of brief, passive psychoeducation on knowledge and ratings of intimate partner violence in the United States and Argentina". Journal of Interpersonal Violence. Sage. 30 (2): 272–294. doi:10.1177/0886260514534775. PMID 24860079. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Johnson, Jennifer A.; Dines, Gail; Condit, Deirdre M.; West, Carolyn M. (April 2015). "Introducing Sexualization, Media & Society". Sexualization, Media, & Society. Sage. 1 (1): 487–515. doi:10.1177/2374623815588763.

"Diagnoses, intervention strategies, and rates of functional improvement in integrated behavioral health care patients". Journal of Consulting and Clinical Psychology.   • Bridges, Ana J.; Minarcik, Jennifer (June 2015). "Psychology graduate students weigh in: qualitative analysis of academic dishonesty and suggestion prevention strategies". Journal of Academic Ethics. Springer. 13 (2): 197–216. doi:10.1007/s10805-015-9230-x. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Foubert, John D. (July 2015). "What is the attraction? Pornography use motives in relation to bystander intervention". Journal of Interpersonal Violence. Sage. doi:10.1177/0886260515596538. PMID 26209307.  View online.
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Andrews III, Arthur R.; Crone, Travis; Cholka, Cecilia B.; Cooper, Theodore V. (October 2015). "Correlational and experimental analyses of the relation between disgust and sexual arousal". Motivation and Emotion. Springer. 39 (5): 766–779. doi:10.1007/s11031-015-9485-y. PMC 4687750 . 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Johnson, Jennifer A.; Sun, Chyng; Ezzell, Matthew B. (October–December 2016). "Sexual scripts and the sexual behavior of men and women who use pornography". Sexualization, Media, & Society. Sage. 2 (4): 1–14. doi:10.1177/2374623816668275. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Karlsson, Marie E.; Zielinski, Melissa J. (November 2015). "Expanding research on a brief exposure-based group treatment with incarcerated women". Journal of Offender Rehabilitation. Taylor and Francis. 54 (8): 599–617. doi:10.1080/10509674.2015.1088918. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Anastasia, Elizabeth A. (December 2015). "Understanding service utilization disparities and depression in Latinos: the role of fatalismo". Journal of Immigrant and Minority Health. Springer. 17 (6): 1–7. doi:10.1007/s10903-015-0196-y. PMID 25801450. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Villalobos, Bianca T.; Anastasia, Elizabeth A.; Ojeda, Carlos A.; Rodriguez, Juventino Hernandez; Gomez, Debbie (February 2016). "Effects of language concordance and interpreter use on therapeutic alliance in Spanish-speaking integrated behavioral health care patients". Psychological Services. American Psychological Association via PsycNET. 13 (1): 49–59. doi:10.1037/ser0000051. PMID 26349073. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Larkin, Kevin T.; Fields, Scott A.; Vogel, Mark E. (February 2016). "Acquiring competencies in integrated behavioral health care in doctoral, internship, and postdoctoral programs". Training and Education in Professional Psychology. American Psychological Association via PsycNET. 10 (1): 14–23. doi:10.1037/tep0000099. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Foubert, John D. (May 2016). "Predicting bystander efficacy and willingness to intervene in college men and women: The role of exposure to varying levels of violence in pornography". Violence Against Women. Sage. 23: 692–706. doi:10.1177/1077801216648793.  (Online first.)
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Villalobos, Bianca T. (July 2016). "Testing an attribution model of caregiving in a Latino sample: the roles of Familismo and the caregiver–care recipient relationship". Journal of Transcultural Nursing. Sage. 27 (4): 322–32. doi:10.1177/1043659615590476. PMID 26082428. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; Dueweke, Aubrey R.; Gomez, Debbie P. (December 2016). "The effects of interpreter use on agreement between clinician- and self-ratings of functioning in Hispanic integrated care patients". Journal of Immigrant and Minority Health. Springer. 18 (6): 1547–1550. doi:10.1007/s10903-015-0288-8. PMID 26420489. 
  • Bridges, Ana J.; McGahan, Tara (in preparation). "What traits do men and women want in a romantic partner? Stated preferences versus actual behavior"
